site.name: Old Crown
site.title: Old Crown - Authentic Nepalese Cuisine & Pub Classics
site.description: Experience the finest Nepalese cuisine and traditional British pub food at Old Crown. Book your table today for an unforgettable dining experience.

hero.title: Welcome to Old Crown
hero.subtitle: Authentic Nepalese Cuisine & Traditional Pub Classics
hero.description: Experience the rich flavors of Nepal combined with traditional British pub food in our cozy, welcoming restaurant. Perfect for family dinners, romantic evenings, or drinks with friends.

items.title: Authentic Nepalese Cuisine
items.description: Traditional recipes passed down through generations, prepared with fresh, quality ingredients

items.title: British Pub Classics
items.description: All your favorite pub dishes made fresh daily with locally sourced ingredients

items.title: Warm & Cozy Atmosphere
items.description: Perfect for family dinners, date nights, or catching up with friends over great food and drinks

items.title: Exceptional Service
items.description: Our friendly staff are dedicated to making your dining experience memorable

items.name: Sarah Johnson
items.text: Absolutely fantastic food! The momos are the best I've had outside of Nepal. The staff are incredibly friendly and the atmosphere is perfect for a family meal.

items.name: Michael Chen
items.text: Great combination of Nepalese and British food. The curry was authentic and flavorful, and the fish and chips were perfectly crispy. Highly recommend!

items.name: Emma Williams
items.text: Lovely cozy restaurant with excellent service. The dal bhat was incredible, and they have a great selection of beers. Will definitely be back!

items.question: Do you take reservations?
items.answer: Yes, we accept reservations through our online booking system or by calling us directly. We recommend booking in advance, especially for weekends.

items.question: What are your opening hours?
items.answer: We're open Monday to Sunday, 12:00 PM to 11:00 PM. Kitchen closes at 10:30 PM.

items.question: Do you cater for dietary requirements?
items.answer: Absolutely! We offer vegetarian, vegan, and gluten-free options. Please inform us of any allergies or dietary requirements when booking.

items.question: Do you offer takeaway?
items.answer: Yes, we offer takeaway service. You can order by phone or visit us in person. Delivery is also available through our partners.
